title: The LEGO Movie 2 Videogame + Prophecy Pack DLC
body:
The LEGO Movie 2 Videogame + Prophecy Pack DLC


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Open world, 3D
Companies: TT Games, Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI14
Original Size: 6.3 GB
Repack Size: from 3.4 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + 2 (Uploaded by Uria Urikra, compatible with torrent)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on The.LEGO.Movie.2.Videogame-RELOADED ISO release: rld-the.lego.movie.2.videogame.iso (6,770,130,944 bytes)
  • The.LEGO.Movie.2.Videogame.DLC.Unlocker-BAT applied over, Prophecy Pack DLC activated
  • Unlike most of my repacks this one is 100% Lossless but NOT MD5 Perfect: game resources were unpacked
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature – you can skip downloading and installing of voice packs you don’t need (English support is included by default)
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 6.3 to 3.4~3.6 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 3-10 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 14 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • ATTENTION! The game uses very long filenames, so to avoid problems, install it to a VERY short path, like C:\TLM2

Game Description

The alien monster invaders have left Bricksburg in ruins and taken Emmet’s friends! It is now up to Emmet and a host of heroic characters to go beyond their world and save their friends from the strange inhabitants of the Systar System. Journey into outer space, discover new worlds, and test your Master Building skills.

You can skip downloading of speech packs you don’t need (English support is included by default). Here is the list of selective files:

  • fg-optional-brazilian.bin
  • fg-optional-french.bin
  • fg-optional-german.bin
  • fg-optional-italian.bin
  • fg-optional-mexican.bin
  • fg-optional-polish.bin
  • fg-optional-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with German language only – skip all “optional” files, but download fg-optional-german.bin & all main files (01-06).
